pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Welcome to SynCDsGen repository!## SynCDsGen(Synthetic Coding Sequences Generator) is a module to sample synthetic coding sequences data from a given generative model.## Installation### Installation by using the pip package:```!pip install syncdsgen --upgrade```### Installation by cloning the repo:You can clone the repo: ```git clone https://github.com/wl-research/syncdsgen```And install requirements:```pip install -r requirements.txt```## How to use the package
